resources.string: Completed On Campus Studies ,Currently taking Distane Education to Complete MS in CS, Motivated Full Stack Developer with more than 5 years of hands-on experience designing, implementing, and testing of mission-critical software solutions

Languages: Java, C++, Functional Programming, Web: JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5, jQuery, AJAX, Node.js, React js, Angular , Express js, , Web Services: SOAP, RESTful API,Jnuit, Mockito, JSON, Frameworks: Spring Boot, Angular , React ,Hibernate, JPA, React

Experienced Full-stack Java/Kotlin developer with over 4 years of hands-on experience on modern Java-based technologies, mainly using Spring and Hibernate with databases like oracle, plsql, MySQL, and MongoDB. I used ReactJS for front-end development. I have worked on business domains like construction, internet-of-things, hospitality, health, e-commerce and agriculture. I am a very good team player and quick learner.
